name: Ump
description:
this is just a shitty game made in 2 hours when all you fucken do is jump over blocks. Amazing., don't get this if you expect amazing graphics or what every. The game is called Ump because when i was making the shitty packages i misspelled Jump A Fucken Amazing I can't spell for shit

"Space" to jump

And fucken "R" to restart.

your shitty little score dosen't save, and might never fucken save.

update 1: I've added Pretty Colour's Because Bitches love Pretty Colours....
